parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the Space this submission belongs to

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the parent submission

parameter.label: Team Name
parameter.tooltip: Approval Team Name

parameter.label: Summary
parameter.tooltip: Short description for approver (used in submission label and email subject)

parameter.label: Details
parameter.tooltip: Long description for approver

parameter.label: Approval Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form the approval is created for

parameter.label: Days Due
parameter.tooltip: Number of days from now the approval is to be completed by

result.name: Denial Reason
result.tooltip: The reason given for why the approval was denied

result.name: Notes for Customer
result.tooltip: Any additional comments the approver provided

result.name: Approver Id
result.tooltip: The Id of the approver who completed the approval

result.name: Approval Submission Id
result.tooltip: The Id of the approval submission

result.name: Fields JSON
result.tooltip: A JSON map of questions that were answered on the approval record

parameters.parameter:
This Routine is designed to be a wrapper for the KD Team Approval Create routine to make it easier to create team approvals.
The wrapper handles lookups and assumes the approval is originating from a Kinetic Core submission.

parameter.label: Decision
parameter.tooltip: The approvers decision (typically "Approved" or "Denied")

parameter.label: Denial Reason
parameter.tooltip: The reason given for why the approval was denied

parameter.label: Notes for Customer
parameter.tooltip: Any additional comments the approver provided

parameter.label: Approver Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the approver who completed the approval

parameter.label: Approval Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the approval submission

parameter.label: Fields JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of questions that were answered on the approval record

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space the approval is created in

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the kapp the approval is created in

parameter.label: Approval Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form the approval is created for

parameter.label: Team Name
parameter.tooltip: Approver Team Name

parameter.label: Summary
parameter.tooltip: A summary of what is being approved

parameter.label: Details
parameter.tooltip: A description of what is being approved

parameter.label: Days Due
parameter.tooltip: Number of days from now the approval is to be completed by

parameter.label: Originating System
parameter.tooltip: Source of parent record (Kinetic Core, Salesforce...etc)

parameter.label: Originating Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of originating systems record

parameter.label: Originating Url
parameter.tooltip: Url to the originating systems record

parameter.label: System Input
parameter.tooltip: Structured data that can be leveraged by the approval record

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to retrieve
